pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation and Gene Selection Based on the Compound Covariate Method Under the Cox Proportional Hazard Model // Cox regression for survival data with high-dimensional gene expressions. Available are statistical methods in Emura et al (2012 PLoS ONE) DOI:10.1371/journal.pone.0047627 and Emura Chen (2016 Stat Methods Med Res) DOI:10.1177/0962280214533378 and a survival dataset for non-small-cell lung cancer patients in Chen et al (2007 New Engl J Med) DOI:10.1056/NEJMoa060096.
